command.name: ro.problems.data.create-entity
command.script: insert into entities(id,creator_id,entity_type_id,complex_entity_type_id,parent_entity_id,title,content) values( $entityId ,$userId ,(select id from entity_types where type='$entityType') ,(select id from complex_entity_type where complex_type ='$complexType') ,$parentId ,'$title' ,'$content' )
